text: Samy Sayed Mekkay Saied Morsy (; born 10 September 1991) is a professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for club Ipswich Town, whom he captains. Born in England, he plays for the Egypt national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League FA Cup FA Cup League Cup
